title: GOAT.Finance Launches BSCs Highest Automatic Fixed APY along with BUSD Rewards - Yahoo Finance
content: GOAT.Finance Launches BSCs Highest Automatic Fixed APY along with BUSD Rewards  Yahoo Finance
description: GOAT.Finance, a DeFi 2.0 protocol developer, is launching a revolutionary type of staking token with amazing fixed APY along with BUSD rewards.Sacramento, CA, USA , March 11, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Decentralized finance(or DeFI) is a financial revolution and is the future of finance and funding. GOAT.Finance holders and investors can earn yields that seem impossible in the financial world. The tool that DeFi companies use to create these high returns are financial algorithms and token staking
